author: ben.mesnik
title: Build NFT liquidity pools
description: NFTs are very illiquid and there's no reliable source for price, yet these are requisite for expanding NFTs into DeFi.
solution: NFT-FT pools create a market for instant NFT liquidity and price discovery. They're a primitive needed for NFTs to be used in DeFi.
experience: We're two first cohort Plutus Pioneers and Haskell developers with degrees in Computer Science
